name: The Beacon of the Forerunners
description:
"The Beacon of the Forerunners" is a short and stylish Click&Find puzzle game.

The game is a direct sequel to "The Island of the Forerunners".
I advise you to play the "Island" first, it's also short.

==================================================

It's the eleventh game in my 2021:GameAMonth project. The theme for the month was "SEQUEL".
